attributes.action: and the UK government to legislate to ensure first aid boxes contain blood glucose monitoring
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many of which are situated in auditoriums and workplaces - in one recent incident - an amulance had to be called to carry out a simple first aid check - just because simple equipment was not available. Could this simple measure improve the care, health and safety of the UK population ?
